base_description: Rectangular beige object with a raised center.
part_description: Consists of a flat beige panel with a centered, raised rectangular section in a darker shade. The raised section is smaller and positioned centrally.
internal_interaction_description: The raised rectangular section is seamlessly integrated into the flat panel, providing a uniform look. The raised part protrudes slightly, creating a subtle depth effect that distinguishes it from the main panel.
external_interaction_description: The object can be affixed to a wall, serving as a cover or decorative piece. It may interact with switches or outlets, allowing users to control electrical devices or access utilities through the raised section.
